label: 八相成道
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The Eight Events (also hassō, Shaka hassō) in the life of Sakyamuni are (1) descending from the Tusita Heaven, (2) entering the womb, (3) leaving the womb, (4) taking religious vows, (5) subjugating demons, (6) attaining enlightenment, (7) rolling the wheel of the dharma, and (8) entering parinirvana (p. 513).
